an3.10:4.1: “Anyone who has three qualities, and has not given up three stains, is cast down to hell.
an3.10:4.3: They’re unethical, and haven’t given up the stain of immorality.
an3.10:4.4: They’re envious, and haven’t given up the stain of envy.
an3.10:4.5: They’re stingy, and haven’t given up the stain of stinginess.
an3.10:4.6: Anyone who has these three qualities, and has not given up these three stains, is cast down to hell.
an3.10:5.1: Anyone who has three qualities, and has given up three stains, is raised up to heaven.
an3.10:5.3: They’re ethical, and have given up the stain of immorality.
an3.10:5.4: They’re not envious, and have given up the stain of envy.
an3.10:5.5: They’re not stingy, and have given up the stain of stinginess.
an3.10:5.6: Anyone who has these three qualities, and has given up these three stains, is raised up to heaven.”
